about.title: YOUR GATEWAY TO EXCELLENCE
about.description: At Link Expert, we take pride in our leadership in facility management and operations, driven by professionalism and innovation. We have successfully established, operated, and trained numerous inspiring projects across various sectors, and developed smart solutions and effective strategies that exceeded expectations and enhanced user experience.
about.description2: We are committed to the highest standards of quality and transparency, working diligently to meet our clients' goals with precision and professionalism. We constantly strive to build long-term partnerships based on trust and shared success, and we look forward to a future filled with achievements and real value for our clients in everything we do.

reviews.title: Our Partners' Reviews
reviews.subtitle: What Our Clients Say About Us

items.review: Your service is excellent and honestly I was surprised by the message after you delivered the car, and even when I requested the car, the staff were very respectful and polite. Premium service at an unbeatable price. Thank you
Excellent administrative performance and exceptional customer care. Please convey my greetings to all Link Expert members
Best staff, always smiling and welcoming. Thank the management for these employees
The experience was excellent and the prices are very reasonable

privacy.title: Usage and Refund Policy
privacy.subtitle: (LINK EXPERT)
privacy.intro_text: Welcome to Link Expert. By using our website or requesting any of our services, you agree to the following terms:
general_items: Users must not misuse or exploit the website or services in any unlawful manner.
All trademarks, designs, images, and content are the intellectual property of Link Expert and may not be reused without permission.
Link Expert reserves the right to update or modify services and content at any time.
privacy_items: Your personal data is protected and handled with confidentiality.
Information is collected and used solely to provide and improve services.
privacy.before_start_text: Full refund minus administrative/setup costs if canceled at least 72 hours in advance.
privacy.after_start_text: A proportional refund will be calculated based on the work completed. The rest will be refunded within 14 business days.
privacy.contracts_text: Written cancellation notice must be provided 30 days in advance.
privacy.less_days_text: No refund due to committed resources.
privacy.ondemand_title: C. On-Demand Services (Valet, Car Wash, Shuttle)
privacy.not_started_text: Cancel at least 2 hours before – full refund.
privacy.custom_text: Non-refundable once resources are allocated or execution has begun.
privacy.contact_intro: To request a refund or cancel a service:
privacy.response_time: We aim to respond within 2 business days.
